explanations.reason: The paper focuses on analyzing the impact of economic and trade policy uncertainty on US and Chinese stock markets, and examines the hedge and safe-haven properties of these stocks. The methodologies used are Dynamic Conditional Correlation (DCC-GJR-GARCH) and Quantile cross-spectral (QS) models, which are econometric techniques rather than machine learning or deep learning methods. There is no mention of any machine learning algorithms, neural networks, or related concepts in the title or abstract.
